meaningMnemonic: Watch what you <radical>say</radical> to what appears to be a <radical>sweet</radical> <radical>tree</radical>, because that tree will 100% <kanji>conspire</kanji> against you.
readingMnemonic: Now you're getting it! That tree is trying to <kanji>conspire</kanji> against you and take you down. Take your <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball and bowl it and all its friends down!
